Uses of Class
org.apache.lucene.index.MergeScheduler

  • Packages that use MergeScheduler 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.index
    Code to maintain and access indices.
    org.apache.lucene.store
    Binary i/o API, used for all index data.

    • Uses of MergeScheduler in org.apache.lucene.index

      Subclasses of MergeScheduler in org.apache.lucene.index 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConcurrentMergeScheduler
      A MergeScheduler that runs each merge using a separate thread.
      class  NoMergeScheduler
      A MergeScheduler which never executes any merges.
      class  SerialMergeScheduler
      A MergeScheduler that simply does each merge sequentially, using the current thread.
      Fields in org.apache.lucene.index declared as MergeScheduler 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MergeScheduler NoMergeScheduler.INSTANCE
      The single instance of NoMergeScheduler
      Methods in org.apache.lucene.index that return MergeScheduler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MergeScheduler IndexWriter.getMergeScheduler()
      Deprecated. 
      use IndexWriterConfig.getMergeScheduler() instead
      MergeScheduler IndexWriterConfig.getMergeScheduler()
      Returns the MergeScheduler that was set by IndexWriterConfig.setMergeScheduler(MergeScheduler)
      Methods in org.apache.lucene.index with parameters of type MergeScheduler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IndexWriter.setMergeScheduler(MergeScheduler mergeScheduler)
      Deprecated. 
      use IndexWriterConfig.setMergeScheduler(MergeScheduler) instead
      IndexWriterConfig IndexWriterConfig.setMergeScheduler(MergeScheduler mergeScheduler)
      Expert: sets the merge scheduler used by this writer.
